ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Glycol Distearate, Laureth-4, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Benzophenone-4, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, CI 19140 CI 14700.
